languages.text: "Вернейшие слуги Императора должны больше думать о том, как нести Его волю сквозь звезды, и меньше — о том, как делить и урывать выгоду", {n}— неодобрительно говорит Арджента. Негромко, впрочем, не пытаясь вмешаться в идущие переговоры.{/n} "Особенно когда речь о благополучии одного из миров Империума, пусть и такого, как Футфол".

"The Emperor's most loyal servants should be more concerned with carrying His will through the stars and less with divvying up profit among themselves," {n}Argenta says disapprovingly, but quietly enough so as not to interrupt the negotiations.{/n} "Especially when the well-being of one of the Imperium's worlds is at stake, even one such as Footfall."
languages.original_text: "Вернейшие слуги Императора должны больше думать о том, как нести Его волю сквозь звезды, и меньше — о том, как делить и урывать выгоду", {n}— неодобрительно говорит Арджента. Негромко, впрочем, не пытаясь вмешаться в идущие переговоры.{/n} "Особенно когда речь о благополучии одного из миров Империума, пусть и такого, как Футфол".

traits.locale_text: "The Emperor's most loyal servants must ruminate more on how to carry His will through the stars and less on how to divide profits in their favor," {n}Argenta says disapprovingly but quietly enough so as not to interrupt the negotiations.{/n} "Especially when deciding the wellbeing of an Imperial world, albeit one such as Footfall."

"The Emperor's most loyal servants must ruminate more on how to carry His will through the stars and less on how to divide profits in their favor," {n}Argenta says disapprovingly but quietly enough so as not to interrupt the negotiations.{/n} "Especially when deciding the wellbeing of an Imperial world, albeit one such as Footfall."

"The Emperor's most loyal servants should be more concerned with carrying His will through the stars and less with divvying up profit among themselves," {n}Argenta says disapprovingly, but quietly enough so as not to interrupt the negotiations.{/n} "Especially when the wellbeing of an Imperial world is at stake, even one such as Footfall."

"The Emperor's most loyal servants should be more concerned with carrying His will through the stars and less with divvying up profit among themselves," {n}Argenta says disapprovingly, but quietly enough so as not to interrupt the negotiations.{/n} "Especially when the wellbeing of an Imperial world is at stake, even one such as Footfall."

"The Emperor's most loyal servants should be more concerned with carrying His will through the stars and less with divvying up profit among themselves," {n}Argenta says disapprovingly, but quietly enough so as not to interrupt the negotiations.{/n} "Especially when the well-being of one of the Imperium's worlds is at stake, even one such as Footfall."

languages.text: 「皇帝のもっとも忠実な従者は自分たちの利益を分け合うことより、星々を通じて皇帝の意志を受け継ぐことに専念すべきです」{n}アルジェンタは不服げに、その一方で交渉の邪魔にならない程度に静かに言う。{/n}「たとえフットフォールのような惑星であっても、帝国の惑星のひとつの幸福が危機に瀕しているのであればなおさらです」
languages.original_text: "The Emperor's most loyal servants should be more concerned with carrying His will through the stars and less with divvying up profit among themselves," {n}Argenta says disapprovingly, but quietly enough so as not to interrupt the negotiations.{/n} "Especially when the well-being of one of the Imperium's worlds is at stake, even one such as Footfall."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝のもっとも忠実な従者は自分たちの利益を分け合うことより、星々を通じて皇帝の意志を受け継ぐことに専念すべきです」{n}アルジェンタは不服げに、その一方で交渉の邪魔にならない程度に静かに言う。{/n}「たとえフットフォールのような惑星であっても、帝国の惑星のひとつの幸福が危機に瀕しているのであればなおさらです」

languages.text: “帝皇最忠诚的仆人，应该多关心关心如何将祂的意志传递到群星之间，而不是讨论如何分配利益。”{n}阿洁塔不满地开了口，但她的声音很低，不会干扰谈判。{/n}“更何况，帝国其中一个世界的福祉已岌岌可危。哪怕是落脚港这样的世界，也不该被弃之不顾。”
languages.original_text: "The Emperor's most loyal servants should be more concerned with carrying His will through the stars and less with divvying up profit among themselves," {n}Argenta says disapprovingly, but quietly enough so as not to interrupt the negotiations.{/n} "Especially when the well-being of one of the Imperium's worlds is at stake, even one such as Footfall."

traits.locale_text: “帝皇最忠诚的仆人，应该多关心关心如何将祂的意志传递到群星之间，而不是讨论如何分配利益。”{n}阿洁塔不满地开了口，但她的声音很低，不会干扰谈判。{/n}“更何况，帝国世界的福祉已岌岌可危，就连落脚港这样的世界也不例外。”

languages.text: «Los siervos más leales del Emperador deberían preocuparse más por ejercer su voluntad a lo largo de las estrellas que por dividirse los beneficios entre ellos», {n}dice Argenta con desaprobación, pero lo bastante en silencio para no interrumpir las negociaciones.{/n} «Sobre todo cuando está en riesgo el porvenir de uno de los mundos del Imperium, aunque se trate de Paso».
languages.original_text: "The Emperor's most loyal servants should be more concerned with carrying His will through the stars and less with divvying up profit among themselves," {n}Argenta says disapprovingly, but quietly enough so as not to interrupt the negotiations.{/n} "Especially when the well-being of one of the Imperium's worlds is at stake, even one such as Footfall."

traits.locale_text: «Los siervos más leales del Emperador deberían preocuparse más por ejercer su voluntad a lo largo de las estrellas que por dividirse los beneficios entre ellos», {n}dice Argenta con desaprobación, pero lo bastante en silencio para no interrumpir las negociaciones.{/n} «Sobre todo cuando está en riesgo el porvenir de un mundo del Imperium, aunque se trate de Paso».

languages.text: « Les serviteurs les plus loyaux de l'Empereur devraient se soucier davantage d'incarner Sa volonté à travers les étoiles et moins d'accumuler des profits à des fins personnelles, {n}déclare Argenta à voix suffisamment basse pour ne pas interrompre les négociations.{/n} Surtout quand le bien-être de l'un des mondes de l'Imperium est menacé, même dans un lieu comme Castel. »
languages.original_text: "The Emperor's most loyal servants should be more concerned with carrying His will through the stars and less with divvying up profit among themselves," {n}Argenta says disapprovingly, but quietly enough so as not to interrupt the negotiations.{/n} "Especially when the well-being of one of the Imperium's worlds is at stake, even one such as Footfall."

traits.locale_text: « Les serviteurs les plus loyaux de l'Empereur devraient se soucier davantage d'incarner Sa volonté à travers les étoiles et moins d'accumuler des profits à des fins personnelles, {n}déclare Argenta à voix suffisamment basse pour ne pas interrompre les négociations.{/n} Surtout quand le bien-être d'un monde de l'Imperium est menacé, même dans un lieu comme Castel. »

languages.text: "Die treuesten Diener des Imperator sollten mehr darum bemüht sein, Seinen Willen zu den Sternen zu tragen, und weniger damit, Profite untereinander aufzuteilen", {n}sagt Argenta missbilligend, aber leise genug, um die Verhandlungen nicht zu unterbrechen.{/n} "Schon gar nicht, wenn das Wohlbefinden einer Welt des Imperiums auf dem Spiel steht, auch wenn es nur Footfall ist."
languages.original_text: "The Emperor's most loyal servants should be more concerned with carrying His will through the stars and less with divvying up profit among themselves," {n}Argenta says disapprovingly, but quietly enough so as not to interrupt the negotiations.{/n} "Especially when the well-being of one of the Imperium's worlds is at stake, even one such as Footfall."

traits.locale_text: "Die treuesten Diener des Imperator sollten mehr darum bemüht sein, Seinen Willen zu den Sternen zu tragen, und weniger damit, Profite untereinander aufzuteilen", {n}sagt Argenta missbilligend, aber leise genug, um die Verhandlungen nicht zu unterbrechen.{/n} "Schon gar nicht, wenn das Wohlbefinden einer Welt des Imperiums auf dem Spiel steht, auch wenn es nur Footfall ist."

languages.text: "İmparator'un sadık hizmetkârlarının derdi; aralarında kazanç bölüşümü yapmak değil, İmparator'un iradesini evrenin dört bir yanına taşımak olmalı." {n}Argenta, müzakereyi bölmemek için fısıldamakla yetinse de anlaşmayı onaylamadığı her hâlinden belli.{/n} "Özellikle de Binliman gibi İmparatorluk dünyalarından birinin refahı söz konusuyken."
languages.original_text: "The Emperor's most loyal servants should be more concerned with carrying His will through the stars and less with divvying up profit among themselves," {n}Argenta says disapprovingly, but quietly enough so as not to interrupt the negotiations.{/n} "Especially when the well-being of one of the Imperium's worlds is at stake, even one such as Footfall."

traits.locale_text: "İmparator'un sadık hizmetkârları, İmparator'un iradesini evrenin dört bir yanına taşımaya odaklanmalı, kâr edip kendi aralarında bölüşmeye değil…" {n}Argenta müzakereyi bölmemek için fısıldıyor ancak bu anlaşmayı onaylamadığı her hâlinden belli.{/n} "Özellikle de Binliman gibi, İmparatorluk'un dünyalarından birinin kaderi söz konusuyken…"
